name: Unidentified_Human_slave_(Sith_Empire)
content:
A slave was a human male who was taken into slavery by the Sith Empire and was the door greeter of the Nexus Room on Dromund Kaas. In 3950 BBY, the slave was present as the door greeter of the Nexus Room on Dromund Kaas when Meetra Surik came to the planet in search of her former mentor Revan.
This slave first appeared within Drew Karpyshyn's 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan.
